description: This table contains information about your bereaved follow-up record's status. These include planned and completed dates, record status, user ID, and user comment. The records included in this table are Bereavement Follow-Up (LHC) records.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the bereavement follow-up record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date, in decimal format, where the integer portion represents the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: Stores the Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status of bereavement follow-up.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Planned


Completed


Deleted

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENT_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant of entry when a record is edited

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_RISK_C_NAME
columns.description:
Risk level related to follow-up contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Low


Medium


High

columns.name: FOL_UP_LET_LST_PRNT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the follow-up letter was last printed.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_OWNER_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the person responsible for the bereavement follow-up. This ID is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.
